title: Covergirl Natureluxe Mousse Mascara, Very Black 500, 0.27-Ounce
description: Experience luxury touched by nature with the NatureLuxe Collection. The light-as-air Silk Foundation takes the heavy weight out of your polished finish. Our Mousse Mascara leaves your lashes looking light and lifted, with up to 2X more volume vs. bare lashes. Complete your simply gorgeous look with Gloss Balm’s touch of soft color and sheen.
